name: Reality Basher
description:
A jungle adventurer stumbles upon an artifact that allows him to traverse realities! Use this ability to solve thought-provoking challenges, gain ludicrous speed, and find out what happens when you no-clip through reality in:

REALITY BASHER

Controls:

  • A/D or Left Joystick: Move
  • Space or A button: Jump
  • Click or X Button: Switch Reality
  • Esc/R key or Y button: Respawn

We hope you enjoy it!
